Class MTSvg

Direct Known Subclasses:
MTSvgButton
public class MTSvg
extends org.mt4j.components.MTComponent

The Class MTSvg. Loads and displays scalable vector graphics (SVG) files.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

Method Detail

getWidthXYRelativeToParent

public float getWidthXYRelativeToParent()
Calculates the width of this shape, by using its bounding rect. Uses the objects local transform. So the width will be relative to the parent only - not the whole world

Returns:
the width xy relative to parent the width

getWidthXYGlobal

public float getWidthXYGlobal()
Gets the "Width vector" and transforms it to world space, then calculates its length.

Returns:
the width xy global the Width relative to the world space

getHeightXYRelativeToParent

public float getHeightXYRelativeToParent()
Gets the "height vector" and transforms it to parent relative space, then calculates its length.

Returns:
the height xy relative to parent the height relative to its parent space frame

getHeightXYGlobal

public float getHeightXYGlobal()
Gets the "height vector" and transforms it to world space, then calculates its length.

Returns:
the height xy global the height relative to the world space

setHeightXYRelativeToParent

public boolean setHeightXYRelativeToParent(float height)
Scales the shape to the given height relative to parent space. Aspect ratio is preserved! The scaling is done Axis aligned, so shearing might occour if rotated!
Uses the shapes bounding shape for calculation.

Parameters:
height - the height
Returns:
true, if the height isnt negative

setHeightXYGlobal

public boolean setHeightXYGlobal(float height)
Scales the shape to the given height relative to world space. Aspect ratio is preserved! The scaling is done Axis aligned, so shearing might occour if rotated!
Uses the shapes bounding shape for calculation.

Parameters:
height - the height
Returns:
true, if sets the height xy global

setWidthXYRelativeToParent

public boolean setWidthXYRelativeToParent(float width)
Scales the shape to the given width relative to parent space. Aspect ratio is preserved!
NOTE: The scaling is done Axis aligned, so shearing might occour if rotated before!
Uses the shapes bounding shape for calculation.

Parameters:
width - the width
Returns:
true, if the width isnt negative

setWidthXYGlobal

Scales the shape to the given width relative to world space. Aspect ratio is preserved! The scaling is done Axis aligned, so shearing might occour if rotated!
Uses the shapes bounding shape for calculation.

Parameters:
width - the width
Returns:
true, if sets the width xy global

setPositionGlobal

public void setPositionGlobal(org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D pos)
Sets the global position of the component. (In global coordinates)
Note: The center of this component is the reference point, not the upper left corner.

Parameters:
pos - the pos

setPositionRelativeToParent

Sets the position of the component, relative to its parent component.
Note: The center of this component is the reference point, not the upper left corner.
